content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The conversation did not result in a final agreed-upon price. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was willing to consider a price range between €950 and €1000, but the potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, was offering €975, which was still too low for Peter Schmidt.
name: Peter Schmidt

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I, as the landlord Peter Schmidt, would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner Haoyu Wang on a scale from 1 to 10 as an 8. There were no indications in the conversation that would suggest a lower rating.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.
name: Peter Schmidt
